New DPRK ambassadors appointed 
    Pyongyang, November 20 (KCNA) -- Pak Tong Chun, Choe Pyong Gwan and O Nam Jung were separately appointed ambassadors E.P. of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the Republic of Cuba, the Lao People's Democratic Republic and the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, according to decrees of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
